{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD mAP |revision=(RBmAP-2nD) |asin=B00N9ZI8IE |price=45 |fcc_date=01/06/2016 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=TV7RBMAP2ND |ic_id=7442A-MAP2ND |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531;AR9331-AL1A; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531;AR9331-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 4; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |oui=00:0C:42, 4C:5E:0C |oui_eth=00:0C:42, 4C:5E:0C }} {{TagLine|Home Access Point}} :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RBmAP2nD Product page]
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD mAP (RBmAP-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RBmAP2nD RBmAP-2nD] ('''mAP''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBMAP2ND TV7RBMAP2ND] :2x FE ports, micro Access Point, PoE, 24V/0.38A, OUI: 00:0C:42, :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB
:1.2dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas {{see also|MikroTik|Gemtek}}
